Texts.Chs: 不要忘了升级军备作坊，只要你有足够的资源。 这是绝对值得的。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to upgrade this station whenever you have the resources to do so. It is absolutely worth the effort.

Texts.Chs: 有了^orange;军备作坊^reset;，你可以开始真正深入了解战斗。当你升级军备作坊，你会接触到^green;巨量各式的武器和盔甲^reset;。你甚至可以从其他现实中发现外星武器！ 现在就尝试建造^orange;军备作坊^reset;吧。
Texts.Eng: With an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; you can start really delving into combat. As you upgrade this station, you'll gain access to a ^green;huge variety of weapons and armors^reset;. You'll even uncover alien weapons from other realities! Try building an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; now.
